node.name: Alarm Log
node.description: Default log for capturing all alarm activity

node.name: actionGUID
node.description: GUID of action event which caused state entry.

node.name: actuator
node.description: Description or name of actuator of this event. The actuator is the agent which caused the Action Event.

node.name: context
node.description: String representation of variable information passed in by actuator to provide information about the cause of the action.

node.name: origin
node.description: Host from which Alarm Event originates

node.name: priority
node.description: Priority associated with this Alarm Event

node.name: state
node.description: Current state of Alarm Event. This is the state which this log entry has recorded entry into.

node.name: stateGUID
node.description: GUID of state event which triggered log entry.

node.name: msglog
node.description: Logs messages from the Mediator Framework

node.name: dynamic_dns
node.description: Dynamic DNS for Mediators connected to a DHCP server

node.name: Trend Manager Handler
node.description: Enables http based management of trends.

node.name: log_download_service
node.description: Enables http based downloading of log files.

node.name: msglog_browser
node.description: Enables browsing of the Mediator Framework Msglog

node.name: properties_browser
node.description: Displays the current Properties of the system in an HTML page

node.name: Trend Manager Handler
node.description: Enables http based management of trends.

node.name: log_download_service
node.description: Enables http based downloading of log files.

node.name: msglog_browser
node.description: Enables browsing of the Mediator Framework Msglog

node.name: properties_browser
node.description: Displays the current Properties of the system in an HTML page

node.name: Bootlog Tester
node.description: Evaluates the Mediators bootlog for errors.

node.name: Counters and Relays Tester
node.description: Tests the Mediators counters and relays.

node.name: uptime
node.description: Seconds since the last Mediator boot

node.name: synch_continuous
node.description: Continuously synchronizes time with one or more time servers via a Broadband connection

node.name: synch_periodic
node.description: Periodically synchronizes time with one or more time servers over an intermittent Internet connection
